MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL68 postcode area of Llanfechell, affecting properties in Crown Terrace and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing network investigations and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:22pm on 16th December 2020.
